name: Adegenet resources
tagline: adegenet: a R package for the multivariate analysis of genetic markers
body:
### Welcome to the new adegenet website!
This page is still under construction. The old *adegenet* website is [there](http://adegenet.r-forge.r-project.org/).

### Authors and Contributors
*adegenet* is developed by [Thibaut Jombart](https://sites.google.com/site/thibautjombart/) (@thibautjombart), with contribution from Caitlin Collins (@caitiecollins), Ismail Ahmed, Zhian Kamvar, Anne Cori, Tobias Erik Reiners, Péter Sólymos, and Federico Calboli.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
